item.title: Wiki table layout
item.content:encoded:
[[module CSS]] #main-content table.wiki-content-table tr:nth-child(odd) { background-color: #E9EEF4; } [[/module]]

Just add the above on the page you want the table to have different coloring for odd/even rows.

Check this page to see how it can look like: Test Page.

I could add this to be the default look but I don't think I like how it looks.
